ygData.subject: Re: I'm done
ygData.msgSnippet: Cya laterz, Minime. Hope you come back soon. ... I ve ... come ... or ... you ... you ... all. ... Day, ... we

Cya laterz, Minime. Hope you come back soon.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> I'm sorry, but I can't do this any more. I keep saying that I'm 
> coming back, and than I don't. It's not fair too all of you. So 
I've 
> decided to take a *temperary* leave of the club. Meaning I could 
come 
> back, but probably not, and if I did it wouldn't be till February 
or 
> March. I'm giving The Trainers to Cyberwolf. The two chars I did 
> bring in, I'll svae them till when and if I come back. Please don't 
> take me off the list. I plan on stopping by once a month to give 
you 
> an update on my personnal problems, catch up on things, and tell 
you 
> how close I am till returning. Well, this is goodbye. Thank You 
all. 
> I will miss you very much, even those who I have gotten into 
> arguements with. I wish you all a Merry Christmas, Happy Hawnaka
> (spelling?), Happy Kwaanza, happy New Years's, Happy Valentine's 
Day, 
> Happy Easter, Happy Yom Kipur, and all those other holidays. Until 
we 
> all meet again in that great big Cybertron in the sky, goodbye.
> 
> Your  friend, Mike Smith(You may think that's a phony name, but it 
> ain't! The Frank Reinhart thing is just my e-mail name.)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> P.S. Sunday's my birthday, if you'd like to know.
